type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.tasks.AbstractLinkTask
type.description: Base task for linking a native binary from object files and libraries.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description: Include the destination directory as an output, to pick up auxiliary files produced alongside the main output file

method.name: getLibs
method.description: The library files to be passed to the linker.

method.name: getLinkerArgs
method.description: Additional arguments passed to the linker.

method.name: getOutputFile
method.description: The file where the linked binary will be located.

method.name: getSource
method.description: The source object files to be passed to the linker.

method.name: getTargetPlatform
method.description: The platform that the linked binary will run on.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: The tool chain used for linking.

method.name: lib
method.description: Adds a set of library files to be linked. The provided libs object is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

method.name: source
method.description: Adds a set of object files to be linked. The provided source object is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

property.name: destinationDir
property.description: Include the destination directory as an output, to pick up auxiliary files produced alongside the main output file

property.name: libs
property.description: The library files to be passed to the linker.

property.name: linkerArgs
property.description: Additional arguments passed to the linker.

property.name: outputFile
property.description: The file where the linked binary will be located.

property.name: source
property.description: The source object files to be passed to the linker.

property.name: targetPlatform
property.description: The platform that the linked binary will run on.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: The tool chain used for linking.
